text: Pal's Sudden Service, or Pal's for short, is a regional fast food restaurant chain. ==Location== They are located in northeast Tennessee and southwestern Virginia. Their stores are concentrated in the Tri-Cities, Tennessee metro region. In 2020, the company had 30 locations. ==History== The first Pal's opened in 1956 in Kingsport, Tennessee. Pal's CEO is Thom Crosby. Category:American fast food restaurants
title: Pal's
